description: Describes resource discovery association with an Amazon VPC IPAM. An associated resource discovery is a resource discovery that has been associated with an IPAM..

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: The resource discovery association filters. (dict) --- A filter name and value pair that is used to return a more specific list of results from a describe operation. Filters can be used to match a set of resources by specific criteria, such as tags, attributes, or IDs. If you specify multiple filters, the filters are joined with an AND, and the request returns only results that match all of the specified filters. For more information, see List and filter using the CLI and API in the Amazon EC2 User Guide. Name (string) --- The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive. Values (list) --- The filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive. If you specify multiple values for a filter, the values are joined with an OR, and the request returns all results that match any of the specified values. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive.

nested_params.name: Values
nested_params.description: The filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive. If you specify multiple values for a filter, the values are joined with an OR, and the request returns all results that match any of the specified values.

nested_items.name: IpamResourceDiscoveryAssociations
nested_items.description: The resource discovery associations.

nested_items.name: OwnerId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the resource discovery owner.

nested_items.name: IpamResourceDiscoveryAssociationId
nested_items.description: The resource discovery association ID.

nested_items.name: IpamResourceDiscoveryAssociationArn
nested_items.description: The resource discovery association Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

nested_items.name: IpamResourceDiscoveryId
nested_items.description: The resource discovery ID.

nested_items.name: IpamId
nested_items.description: The IPAM ID.

nested_items.name: IpamArn
nested_items.description: The IPAM ARN.

nested_items.name: IpamRegion
nested_items.description: The IPAM home Region.

nested_items.name: IsDefault
nested_items.description: Defines if the resource discovery is the default. When you create an IPAM, a default resource discovery is created for your IPAM and it's associated with your IPAM.

nested_items.name: ResourceDiscoveryStatus
nested_items.description: The resource discovery status.
active - Connection or permissions required to read the results of the resource discovery are intact.

not-found - Connection or permissions required to read the results of the resource discovery are broken. This may happen if the owner of the resource discovery stopped sharing it or deleted the resource discovery. Verify the resource discovery still exists and the Amazon Web Services RAM resource share is still intact.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The lifecycle state of the association when you associate or disassociate a resource discovery.
associate-in-progress - Resource discovery is being associated.
associate-complete - Resource discovery association is complete.
associate-failed - Resource discovery association has failed.
disassociate-in-progress - Resource discovery is being disassociated.
disassociate-complete - Resource discovery disassociation is complete.
disassociate-failed - Resource discovery disassociation has failed.
isolate-in-progress - Amazon Web Services account that created the resource discovery association has been removed and the resource discovery associatation is being isolated.
isolate-complete - Resource discovery isolation is complete..
restore-in-progress - Resource discovery is being restored.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: A tag is a label that you assign to an Amazon Web Services resource. Each tag consists of a key and an optional value. You can use tags to search and filter your resources or track your Amazon Web Services costs.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key of the tag.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the tag.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: Specify the pagination token from a previous request to retrieve the next page of results.
